entry.title: HD wallet import strategies
entry.summary: In a post on the bitcoin-dev forum, Jean-Paul asked for input on HD wallet import strategies. He posed several questions to the community, including what information is essential when importing an HD wallet root key, how existing HD wallet import functions work, and whether guidelines should be established to ensure different implementations can import each other's root keys. Jean-Paul also requested any additional thoughts or insights on the subject. The discussion stemmed from a previous thread on bitcointalk and was met with interest from members of the bitcoin-dev community.
